name: 芮祥鵬
objective:
本門授課之目的在於介紹奈米材料及其製程(包括濕式及乾式奈米材料法)，並探討奈米材料的未來發展及應用。所包括的課程主題如下：所包括的課程主題如下：
1. mechanical properties for nano solid
2. thermal properties for nano solid
3. electric properties for nano solid
4. magnetic properties for nano solid
5. fatigue
6. fluid property for nano suspension
7. viscoelastic property for nano suspension
8. elastic property for nano blend
schedule:
1. nanomaterial introduction(1)
2. nanomaterial introduction (2)
3. mechanical properties for nano solid
4. mechanical properties for nano solid nano
5, thermal properties for nano solid
6. thermal properties for nano solid
7. electric properties for nano solid
8. magnetic properties for nano solid
9. Mid term exam.
10. fatigue
11.fatigue
12. fluid property for nano suspension
13. fluid property for nano suspension
14. viscoelastic property for nano suspension
15. viscoelastic property for nano suspension
16. elastic property for nano blend
17. review
18. final exam
